Articles.Content: So I had an emissive texture on an engine I am making and it worked fine. Then I added something to the config (irelivant to the heat animation module) and now the emissive texture applies to the whole part so the whole engine goes bright red rather than just the inside. I tried changing the config to be EXACTLY how it was before but this did not fix it. Any ideas?
So after basically deleting everything apart from the original blender model and starting again. It finally doesn't turn the whole engine bright red. This post can be removed now
That all being said... that was weird.
I'd suspect something you forgot and done something with the importing than just the config editing.
